jext.lettermanager

Letter Manager

Handles printing and layout of letters

class LetterManager;
Letter Manager

@property ref auto letters();
get/set letters (Letter[])

@property ref auto area();
get/set bounds

@property ref auto square();
get/set square (text box)

@property ref auto alternate();
get/set alternating colours on or off

@property auto count();
get number of letters (including white space)

Letter opIndex(int pos);
Get letter using passed index number

this(Square square);
Constructor, setting area

void setLockAll(bool lock0);
lock/unlock all letters

void setLetterBase(LetterBase letterBase);
For access to inputManager

string addTextln(string str);
Add text with new line added to the end

void addText(string str);
Add text without new line being added to the end

void setText(in string stringLetters);
apply text from string - also places text

string getText();
Get converted text (string format)

void placeLetters();
Postion text for display

void update();
Eg. bouncing letters

void draw();
Draw stuff in square area

@property ref auto letterBase();
access m_letterBase (LetterBase)

@property ref auto copiedText();
access copiedText (string)
